Author: gigi-has-issues
Text: Send him a recent picture with some dumb pretext ("Oh I went to the zoo today! Look at me at the zoo! ") and see how he reacts. You are probably over thinking this and this will calm your nerves.

Author: linedryonly
Text: If you really connected and he really values you as a person, then it won't matter what you weigh. He'll just want to spend time with you.  I know it's hard to comprehend, but I know it's a thing because I'm in kind of the opposite situation. I have a close childhood friend who is clinically obese. When I meet up with her, I'm never 'disappointed' in her appearance. In fact, it always strikes me how beautiful she is and how much fun we have together.   I know we hold ourselves to an impossibly high standard, but other people (least of all our friends) don't. If I were in your shoes, I would challenge myself to meet him at my current weight and give him a chance to love me as I am.
